name: Blast The Haters!
description:
The imoyourbz haters has kidnapped imoyourbz! Now imoyourbz has been trapped in a realm with only his haters! He needs to escape as quickly his possible! Help him escape by navigating 3 levels and blast his haters with his bodygun! He also needs to deal with 2 BOSSES! Help imoyourbz escape from his haters by clicking or tapping the screen to make him shoot bullets. The haters are imoyourbz's enemies, so they must be blasted to atoms! If they touch you or you touch them, you will lose health points. Lose too many and you will die! You can gain health by collecting Lofias, which have a heart on them. They are the only good guys here, so collect some to boost up your health! Be careful! Some imoyourbz haters shoot bullets also, and if you get hit you will also lose health! Be careful! Imoyourbz must escape from this dangerous realm of his haters, and return back home, safe and sound to continue making YouTube videos! Imoyourbz should never deserve hate, and he never will again!

Hey guys that was just a short little description of my game. If you wanna support me you could subscribe to my YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrQOeW1C6GkgCYgUbLVgRjA?view_as=subscriber

And join my discord server: https://discord.gg/u9rec5y

Have fun with my game! :)

-imoyourbz

NOTE: Somdtimes after you defeat the first boss (juanes.m3 boss) you will stay stuck and unable to advance to level 3. If that happens then just refresh the page and it should fix. I am trying to fix this bug so please be patient.
